statements: DELETE FROM water_conservation_campaign WHERE campaign_id = 1001 AND program_name = 'Conservation 101';
DELETE FROM water_conservation_campaign WHERE outreach_date < '2022-01-01' AND num_participants > 50;
DELETE FROM program_participants WHERE city = 'New York' AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM program_participants WHERE program_id = 2 AND participant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM program_feedback WHERE program_id = 500 AND participant_id = 200;
DELETE FROM outreach_results WHERE outcome = 'Not Successful';
